1.SceneDescription: A Video Store, Monica is running in to return a video.

lines.Character: (The clerk enters the video into the computer
lines.Line: The clerk enters the video into the computer.
Six? I just had it for one night. It’s three

Eight o’clock is the cut-off and, (looks at his watch) aww,
it’s 8:02

Y'know in a weird way, you have too much power. Look, you’re gonna
have to help me out here, ‘cause I only have three
(standing behind her, without his moustache) I can help with that
(standing behind her, without his moustache) I can help with that
Oh my God. Richard? (turns around) Hi
Wow! Your lip went bald. (Richard pays the clerk) Hey, thanks
You’ve got panties stuck to your leg

(removes them) That’s because I-I was just grabbing some things out
of the dryer, and it’s static cling. Or maybe it’s just that God knew I’d
be running into you and saw an opportunity
It’s good to see you too

lines.Character:
(They hug, and Richard notices a stocking stuck to Monica’s back, which he removes
for her
lines.Line:
They hug, and Richard notices a stocking stuck to Monica’s back, which he removes
for her.

2.SceneDescription: Monica and Rachel's, Chandler, Ross. Joey, and Rachel are eating breakfast. Chandler is holding a bottle of Hersey’s Syrup.

lines.Line: Making chocolate milk. Do you want some
(looking at her watch) Oh my God, I gotta go to work
Oh sweetie, when do you think you’re going to get off tonight
Oh I don’t know honey. It’s gonna be really late
Oh I don’t know honey. It’s gonna be really late

I know. I’m sorry. Look, I’ll make a deal with you all right?
Okay
For every night that you’re asleep before I get home from work..
I will wake you up in a way that’s proved very popular in the past
Now, if you need to stay late, I want to be supportive of that
(entering, holding a pair of Roller Blades) Hi
(to Phoebe) Look at you. Since when do you roller blade

Oh! Since tomorrow. I met this really cute guy in the park and he like
y'know, jogs, and blades, and swims, and so y'know we made a deal that’s he’s
going to teach me all sorts of jock stuff
And what are you going to do for him
And what are you going to do for him
Somebody got in late last night
Yeah well, I ran into Richard.
Yeah well, I ran into Richard.

Oh, um, around 8:02. We ah, talked for a little while, and then um, we
went out for an innocent burger
Oh, there’s no such thing as an innocent burger
Oh, there’s no such thing as an innocent burger
So, are you gonna see him again

Well, she spent the last six months getting over him, and now
she’s celebrating that by going on a date with him

It’s not a date, okay. I’m just gonna teach him how to make
lasagne for some pot luck dinner he has

Well, you might wanna make a little extra, y'know you’ll probably be
hungry after the sex

We’re not gonna have sex! Okay, nothing’s changed here. He
still doesn’t want children and I still do, so that’s why we’re just gonna
be friends

3.SceneDescription:
Central Perk, Chandler and Ross are there, Phoebe is entering with her date
Robert.

lines.Line: Um, Chandler, Ross, this is Robert

(to Robert) You’ve have lipstick right here (points to her cheek).
That’s okay, it’s mine, we just kissed
(to Robert) So ah, isn’t a bit cold out for shorts
Right, right. Sometimes you guys just burst into flames

lines.Character:
(Robert leans back on the arm of the chair and allows Chandler to see up his shorts and
sees ‘little Robert.’ Chandler is horrified by this view
lines.Line:
Robert leans back on the arm of the chair and allows Chandler to see up his shorts and
sees ‘little Robert.’ Chandler is horrified by this view.

(standing up) I’m up! I’m up, I’ve gotten up now!
Anybody ah, want anything
Okay Ross, why don’t you come with me

Okay. (goes over to the counter) (to Chandler) What ah, what is the matter
with you? What’s going on
What, what do you mean, what? Is he gay
What, what do you mean, what? Is he gay
No. He.....he’s coming out of his shorts

Are you sure? (Chandler nods: Yes!) Hold on. (walks over behind the couch)
I’m sorry you guys, that was a coffee and a...
We could write it down for you

No, no, that won’t be ah, that won’t be necessary (leans down
and looks up Robert’s shorts, seeing Robert’s package.)
What do we do? What do we do
Well, I suppose we just try to not look directly at it

4.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Chandler is watching Joey read Little Women, Ross is also there.

lines.Line:
Oh yeah! Amy just burned Jo’s manuscript. I don’t see how he
could ever forgive her
Umm, Jo’s a girl, it’s short for Josephine
Umm, Jo’s a girl, it’s short for Josephine
But Jo’s got a crush on Laurie. (Ross nods his head) Oh. You mean it’s like a girl-girl thing? ‘Cause that is the one thing missing from The Shining
No wonder Rachel had to read this so many times
Hey! How’d the ah, basketball go

Oh, okay, I learned how to shoot a lay-up, a foul shot, and a
twenty-three pointer
Oh, I get more because I’m dainty
Oh, I get more because I’m dainty
So um, is there a phone here, I can check my messages
Yeah, in the back. You want a quarter
Oh, no thanks. I always carry one in my sock.
Oh, no thanks. I always carry one in my sock.

lines.Character:
(He puts his leg up on the couch to get the quarter, once again exposing himself to
Chandler and Ross. In horror, Chandler, slides over and leans against Joey on the couch
lines.Line:
He puts his leg up on the couch to get the quarter, once again exposing himself to
Chandler and Ross. In horror, Chandler, slides over and leans against Joey on the couch.

(noticing Chandler) What are you doing? (he pushes Chandler back to his
side of the couch) Get back over on your side of the... (sees Robert in all his glory)
Hello!! (to Robert) Hi, I’m Joey, we haven’t met
Ah, good to meet you. Robert
Ah, good to meet you. Robert

lines.Character: (Robert walks away and the guys all start laughing in front of Phoebe
lines.Line: Robert walks away and the guys all start laughing in front of Phoebe.

What? (the guys keep laughing.) What? You guys, what is going on? You
not like Robert? (the guys keep laughing.) Why are you laughing?
Calm down. There’s no reason to get testy
Calm down. There’s no reason to get testy

I’m sorry, I’m sorry, it just seems that Robert isn’t
as concealed in the shorts area, as ah, one may have hoped
Hey Robert, could you ah, ha, pass me those cookies

lines.Character:
(He puts his leg up on the table to pass Joey the cookies, and Phoebe sees what the
guys are laughing at, and gasps
lines.Line:
He puts his leg up on the table to pass Joey the cookies, and Phoebe sees what the
guys are laughing at, and gasps.

5.SceneDescription: Monica’s bedroom, she’s in bed with Richard.

lines.Line: So we can be friends who sleep together
Absolutely, this will just be something we do, like racquetball

Sounds smart and healthy to me. So um, just out of curiosity, um, do you
currently have any other racquetball buddies

Just your dad. (pause) Although that’s actually racquetball. You
know I-I do have a blind date with my sister’s neighbour next Tuesday
You want me to cancel it

‘Cause if you do that means you’d be cancelling it for me, and
we’re just friends

6.SceneDescription: Monica and Rachel's, Rachel is reading The Shining, as Monica enters.

lines.Line:
(screams and grabs a potato masher to defend herself) Sorry. I’m
sorry

You would not believe my day! I had to work two shifts, and then to top
it off, I lost one of my fake boobs, (opens her coat revealing a large burn mark over her
left breast.) in a grill fire
I’m sorry, I was just thinking you’re day could still pick up

lines.Character:
(She goes into her bedroom, and sees Richard who has covered the room in roses and has
two glasses of wine and a rose between his lips
lines.Line:
She goes into her bedroom, and sees Richard who has covered the room in roses and has
two glasses of wine and a rose between his lips.

7.SceneDescription:
Richard’s bedroom, Monica has covered it in rose pedals and candles. We
hear Richard come in to the apartment, and Monica frantically throws the rest of the
pedals on the bed, and jumps onto the bed and puts a rose in her mouth, and bites a
thorn.

lines.Line:
(outside the bedroom) Really?! Well, it’s just like everyone
else’s apartment. It’s got rooms, walls, and ceilings

Well, I just wanted to see where you lived. Now, give me
the tour

Oh my God! Oh my God! (She frantically tries to clean up the bedroom as
Richard starts the tour.
Ah well, this is the living room
Ah well, this is the living room
Ah well, this is the living room
All right. This is the kitchen
All right. This is the kitchen

Oh, that’s real pretty. Wait a minute, don’t I
get to see the bedroom

The bedroom. Well it’s pretty much your typical... (opens the door
as Monica hides under the covers, and quickly closes the door before his date can see the
room.) bedroom
We’re still on this side of the door
We’re still on this side of the door
Yeah, but I didn’t get to see it

Oh shoot! Maybe next time. (yawns) Thanks for a lovely evening. (shows
her out

lines.Character:
[Cut to into the bedroom, with Monica still hiding under the covers. Richard enters and
sits down next to her
lines.Line:
Cut to into the bedroom, with Monica still hiding under the covers. Richard enters and
sits down next to her.
(still hiding under the blankets) So um, who was she
(still hiding under the blankets) So um, who was she

Oh, (laughs) that was the blind date that I told you about, she called
and switched it to today

(still hiding under the blankets) Did you like her? And I’m just
asking as a friend, because I am totally fine with this

(gets up) Okay, y'know what, I’m not fine, I’m not. I mean how
can I be fine, hearing you come in with her, she wants to see your bedroom.... (pause)
Y'know what, what if we’re friends who don’t see other people

Why not?! I mean this has been the most amazing week. Would it be so
terrible? Even if we were friends who lived together. Or, maybe someday friends who stood
up in front of their other friends, and vowed to be friends forever

Wow. Y'know we’re back where we were. Honey, I would love to do
all that, but nothing’s changed
That’s not true, you don’t have a moustache
That’s not true, you don’t have a moustache

Okay, okay, one thing’s changed. But we still want different
things and we know how this is gonna end

Y'know what, I’ve got to walk out of here right now, ‘cause
getting over you is the hardest thing that I have ever had to do. I don’t think I
could do it again
How ‘bout one last game of racquetball

lines.Character:
(They both kiss, and Richard picks her up and goes over to the bed and starts to lie
down
lines.Line:
They both kiss, and Richard picks her up and goes over to the bed and starts to lie
down.
